unnormalised: Choosing a payment gateway is more stressful than deciding what to wear for Diwali! Seriously, so many options!
normalised: Choosing a payment gateway is more stressful than deciding what to wear for Diwali! Seriously, so many options!

unnormalised: Will my customers from Kerala even use this gateway to pay for their Onam Sadhya ingredients?
normalised: Will my customers from Kerala even use this gateway to pay for their Onam Sadhya ingredients?

unnormalised: Rs. 2000 minimum transaction fee? Hai Ram! My biryani business won't survive that!
normalised: rupees two thousand minimum transaction fee? Hai Ram! My biryani business won't survive that!

unnormalised: Better look for something easier than trying to navigate Delhi traffic at 5 PM.

unnormalised: Maybe even simpler than explaining GST to Uncle Sharma. He still thinks it's a foreign conspiracy!
normalised: Maybe even simpler than explaining G S T to Uncle Sharma. He still thinks it's a foreign conspiracy!

unnormalised: Someone, please, make this easier than ordering a masala dosa!
normalised: Someone, please, make this easier than ordering a masala dosa!

unnormalised: Otherwise, I'm switching back to cash on delivery.
normalised: Otherwise, I'm switching back to cash on delivery.
